actions.description: Asteria makes two Radiant Blade attacks and uses Bursting Benediction.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: 11 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (1d8 + 5) slashing damage plus 13 (3d8) radiant damage.
actions.name: Radiant Blade

actions.description: Asteria causes a burst of magical energy to envelop one creature she can see within 60 feet of herself. The target must make a DC 19 Dexterity saving throw, taking 40 (9d8) force damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. Asteria or another creature that she can see within 60 feet of herself then regains 10 hit points.
actions.name: Bursting Benediction

actions.description:
Asteria casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 19):
At will: Guidance, Light, Thaumaturgy

2/day each: Bless, Freedom of Movement, Greater Restoration, Plane Shift (self only), Protection from Evil and Good, Revivify
actions.name: Spellcasting

actions.description: Asteria makes one Radiant Blade attack.
actions.name: Brazen Strike

actions.description: Asteria moves up to her speed. This movement doesn't provoke opportunity attacks.
actions.name: Nimble Sprint

specialTraits.description: Whenever a creature of Asteria's choice within 30 feet of her makes a saving throw, Asteria can give the creature advantage on the saving throw (no action required). This trait doesn't function if Asteria has the incapacitated condition.
specialTraits.name: Guardian Aura

specialTraits.description: If Asteria fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.
specialTraits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)

specialTraits.description: Asteria wears Winged Boots, which grant her a flying speed (included in her statistics). She also carries one half of a pair of Sending Stones; the other half of the pair is held by Euryale.
specialTraits.name: Special Equipment
